passport.name: Passport Seva Portal
passport.description: Official portal for passport applications, renewals, and tracking. Apply online for fresh passports, renewals, and police clearance certificates.

aadhaar.description: Official Aadhaar portal for enrollment, updates, downloads, and verification. Get your Aadhaar card, update demographics, and download e-Aadhaar.

pan_card.description: Official portal for PAN card applications, corrections, and linking services. Apply for new PAN, make corrections, and link with Aadhaar.

voter_id.description: Official portal for voter registration, voter ID card services, and electoral roll searches. Register as voter, apply for voter ID, and check electoral roll.

driving_license.name: Parivahan Sewa Portal
driving_license.description: Official portal for driving license services, vehicle registration, and transport-related services. Apply for DL, renew license, and book slots.

digital_certificates.name: Controller of Certifying Authorities
digital_certificates.description: Official portal for digital signature certificates and PKI services. Apply for digital certificates for secure online transactions.
